summaries.summary: China's stock market sees gains, with the Shanghai Composite Index up 0.70% and the Shenzhen Component Index up 1.08%. The ChiNext Index also rises 1.36%. Key news includes the Beijing Daxing Airport breaking 50 million passengers, Lenovo, Dell, and HP planning price hikes due to storage costs, and the establishment of the first 'ocean chip' research institute in China.
key_points: Beijing Daxing Airport breaks 50 million passenger milestone
Lenovo, Dell, and HP plan price hikes due to storage costs
First 'ocean chip' research institute established in China
